description: Fast and secure remote desktop (RDP, VNC, Fluid) application for Windows
notes: Jump Desktop provides remote desktop access via RDP, VNC, and Fluid protocols with end-to-end encryption.
This is a nonportable application that requires admin rights to install.

script: if (!(is_admin)) { error "$app requires admin rights to $cmd"; break }

uninstaller.script: if (!(is_admin)) { error "$app requires admin rights to $cmd"; break }
